overview: When seven 'working girls' get together to share some of their shocking trick-tales, we get brutally honest accounts of what it's like to fuck for a living in the bowels of Los Angeles. They find something else to share when they pick up an old VHS copy of the OG New Wave Hookers at a garage sale: something makes them keep watching, and before they know it, they're captivated and turned-on, and they become. . .Neu Wave Hookers.
title: Neu Wave Hookers
